idiriye ena uthsawa samayedi hingayakin thorawa welenda polata bhanda sapayimatath mila sthawarawa pawathwagena yamatath samupakara ha abhyanthara welenda katayuthu amathyanshaya katayuthu yoda thibe.bhanda sangawa hingayak mawa pa mila wadikara paribhogikayan surakamata salasum karana kuta wyaparika mafiyawata thawaduratath gasakamwalata ida nothabana bawa samupakara ha abhyanthara welenda katayuthu pilibanda amathi jonstan pranandu mahatha pawasiya.uthsawa samayata awashya siyaluma athyawashya bhanda sa.tho.sa. haraha sthawara milak yatathe rata pura bedaharime jalayak lesa kriyathmaka kere. sa.tho.sa. saha samupakarayata awashya ema bhanda wiwidha wyaparika aayathanawalin nowa ekama sthanayakin labaganimatada janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha upades di thibe.hal, kiripiti, parippu, halmassan, saman, ala, sini, wiyali miris, kukul mas, biththara saha elawalu me wana witath itha adu milakata labagatha hakiya.uthsawa samayedi paudgalika wyaparikayan athyawashya bhanda mila ihala damana heyin sama bhandayakama mila ada thaththwayen ho eeta aduwen paribhogikayata labadimata me wana witath katayuthu yoda atha.me sandaha aanayanaya karana bhanda rasaka thoga danatamath anawum kara thibe.
